item.title: Vumi
item.description: “My intention is to work towards becoming a judge where I can make a meaningful contribution to the ongoing endeavours of tax compliance, coherence, and the improving of international tax policy in Africa.” Short CV Work Experience 2020-present: Founder, Medusa Hair, Durban, South Africa 2019: English Language Teacher, Yumi English, Busan, South Korea Education 2019-2020: International Tax Center Leiden, Leiden, Netherlands 2014-2018: LLB Law, University of Cape Town, Cape Town, South Africa
